page.title: 03INDUSTRY 2
page.content:
Many people are employed in tourist related industries such as shops,resturant,bus companies, and tourist related services. The main attraction for tourists in Fortwilliam is Ben Nevis. The area of Fort Wiiliam that falls within this block is the main shopping,banking,commercial and health related area - Fort William High Street.
{Diving School. The old Railway pier has been developed over a number of years into one of the most important Diving Schools in Europe. The sshool caters for divers and trainee divers from all over the world. One of its major advantages is the depth of Loch Linnhe_ 300 ft.
